name: agentic-trust-platform
description: Agentic Trust - AI Agent Infrastructure Platform

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format .
scripts.format:check:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format --check .
scripts.type-check:backend: cd backend && uv run mypy app/
scripts.security:backend: cd backend && uv run bandit -c pyproject.toml -r app/
scripts.pre-commit: cd backend && uv run pre-commit run --all-files
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run security
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d postgres redis && sleep 5 && npm run db:migrate
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules web/node_modules web/.next backend/.venv backend/__pycache__
